headline: Trump Exits, Denouncing ‘Sleaze Bags’ In Congress
abstract: The White House hoped the president’s trip to the World Economic Forum would shift attention away from impeachment, but an impromptu news conference often turned to the drama in Washington.
lead_paragraph: DAVOS, Switzerland — President Trump said on Wednesday that he would prefer a long impeachment trial with witness testimony before the Senate, but that national security concerns made that impossible, and added that he would like to attend the trial.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
